Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesamphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of a lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; top of rim glazed; exterior: dot ban between pairs of lines at rim; below body mostly reserved, with red blob.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1976) (phase 2)
